snippet: Movie-ticket sales this past weekend totaled $164 million, a 3 percent increase over the same period last year, with “Mission: Impossible — Ghost Protocol,” starring Tom Cruise, topping the rankings.
abstract: Movie ticket sales in the first weekend of January 2012 total $164 million, a 3 percent increase over the same period in 2011, with the sequel Mission Impossible - Ghost Protocol, directed by Brad Bird and starring Tom Cruise, topping the rankings.
lead_paragraph: Movie-ticket sales this past weekend totaled $164 million, a 3 percent increase over the same period last year, with “Mission: Impossible — Ghost Protocol,” starring Tom Cruise, topping the rankings.

headline.seo: ‘Mission: Impossible’ With Tom Cruise Still Box-Office Leader
headline.main: Tom Cruise Is Again a Box-Office Draw
headline.print_headline: Tom Cruise Is Again a Box-Office Draw
